department.dept_long_name: Department of Slavic Languages and Literatures

course.title: Poetic Self-Creation in 20th-Century Russia: Seminar
course.description: Examines how poems create self-images for poets working in and after Russian modernism, including Khlebnikov, Vvedenskii, Mandel'shtam, Tsvetaeva, Barkova, Brodsky, Sedakova, Shvarts, Dragomoshchenko. Relies on literary and psychoanalytic theories of identity.
course.notes: Open to qualified undergraduates with permission of instructor.
